descriptionEn: AI should not be a game for giants, and models are not necessarily smarter just because they are bigger. title: 谷歌两大“小强”开源，2.7亿参数击败SOTA
description: 谷歌这次似乎要“主账号和副账号同时升级”：在与 Gemini 搅动大型模型战场后，它发布了两个设备上的“战友”：一个回归复古、硬核架构，另一个专门教导 AI“不要只是聊天，开始工作”。
titleZh: 谷歌两大“小强”开源，2.7亿参数击败SOTA
titleEn: Google's Two 'Little Powerhouses' Go Open Source, 270M Parameters Beat SOTA
descriptionZh: 谷歌这次似乎要“主账号和副账号同时升级”：在与 Gemini 搅动大型模型战场后，它发布了两个设备上的“战友”：一个回归复古、硬核架构，另一个专门教导 AI“不要只是聊天，开始工作”。
descriptionEn: Google seems to be 'leveling up both its main and alt accounts' this time: right after stirring up the large model battlefield with Gemini, it released two on-device 'brothers-in-arms': one returns to a retro, hardcore architecture, while the other specializes in teaching AI 'don't just chat, get to work'. The smart agent hub in your phone is about to get competitive.
